017package org.apache.juneau.examples.bean.atom;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.xml.*;
021
022/**
023 * Atom feed XML example.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 * </ul>
027 */
028public class AtomXmlExample {
029
030   /**
031    * XML Atom feed example.
032    *
033    * @param args Unused.
034    * @throws Exception Unused.
035    */
036   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
037   public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
038
039      Feed feed = AtomFeed.getAtomFeed();
040
041      // Example with no namespaces
042      // Create a serializer with readable output, no namespaces yet.
043      XmlSerializer s = XmlSerializer.create().sq().ws().build();
044
045      //Produces
046      /**
047       *<feed>
048       *<id> tag:juneau.apache.org</id>
049       *<link href='http://juneau.apache.org/' rel='alternate' type='text/html' hreflang='en'/>
050       *<link href='http://juneau.apache.org/feed.atom' rel='self' type='application/atom+xml'/>
051       *<title type='text'>Juneau ATOM specification</title>
052       *<updated>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</updated>
053       *<generator uri='http://juneau.apache.org/' version='1.0'>Juneau</generator>
054       *<subtitle type='html'>Describes <em>stuff</em> about Juneau</subtitle>
055       *<entry>
056       *  <author>
057       *      <name>Jane Smith</name>
058       *      <uri>http://juneau.apache.org/</uri>
059       *      <email>janesmith@apache.org</email>
060       *  </author>
061       *  <contributor>
062       *      <name>John Smith</name>
063       *  </contributor>
064       *  <id>tag:juneau.apache.org</id>
065       *  <link href='http://juneau.apache.org/juneau.atom' rel='alternate' type='text/html'/>
066       *  <link href='http://juneau.apache.org/audio/juneau_podcast.mp3' rel='enclosure' type='audio/mpeg' length='12345'/>
067       *  <title>Juneau ATOM specification snapshot</title>
068       *  <updated>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</updated>
069       *  <content base='http://www.apache.org/' lang='en' type='xhtml'>
070       *      <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p><i>[Update: Juneau supports ATOM.]</i></p></div>
071       *  </content>
072       *  <published>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</published>
073       *</entry>
074       *</feed>
075       */
076      //Serialize to ATOM/XML
077      String atomXml = s.serialize(feed);
078
079      /**
080       * Produces
081       * <feed>
082       * <link hreflang='en' rel='alternate' href='http://juneau.apache.org' type='text/html'/>
083       * <link rel='self' href='http://juneau.apache.org/feed.atom' type='application/atom+xml'/>
084       * <title>Juneau ATOM specification</title>
085       * <updated>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</updated>
086       * <id>tag:juneau.apache.org</id>
087       * <subtitle type='html'>Describes <em>stuff</em> about Juneau</subtitle>
088       * <generator version='1.0' uri='http://juneau.apache.org'>Juneau</generator>
089       * <entry>
090       *  <link rel='alternate' href='http://juneau.apache.org/juneau.atom' type='text/html'/>
091       *  <link rel='enclosure' href='http://juneau.apache.org/audio/juneau_podcast.mp3' type='audio/mpeg' length='1337'/>
092       *  <author>
093       *      <uri>http://juneau.apache.org</uri>
094       *      <email>janesmith@apache.org</email>
095       *      <name>Jane Smith</name>
096       *  </author>
097       *  <contributor>
098       *      <name>John Smith</name>
099       *  </contributor>
100       *  <title>Juneau ATOM specification snapshot</title>
101       *  <updated>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</updated>
102       *  <id>tag:juneau.sample.com,2013:1.2345</id>
103       *  <published>2016-01-02T03:04:05Z</published>
104       *  <content lang='en' base='http://www.apache.org/' type='xhtml'><div><p><i>[Update: Juneau supports ATOM.]</i></p></div></content>
105       * </entry>
106       * </feed>
107       */
108      // Create a serializer with readable output, no namespaces yet.
109      XmlSerializer ns = XmlSerializer.create().sq().ws().build();
110
111      // Serialize to ATOM/XML
112      atomXml = ns.serialize(feed);
113   }
114}
